compatibility.notes: CC-BY-2.5-AU is a permissive license that allows for wide compatibility with other permissive licenses. However, it is incompatible with copyleft licenses like GPL.

key_requirements: Must provide attribution to the original author.
Must include the license when sharing the work.
Must include copyright information when sharing the work.
Must provide notice of any modifications made to the work.
license.name: CC-BY-2.5-AU
obligations: Attribution must be given to the original author.
License must be included with any distribution of the work.
Copyright notice must be included with any distribution of the work.
Notice of any changes made to the work must be provided.
